p: Twenty‐five AHDS‐D and 53 HC‐D were enrolled. Faecal BA concentrations were measured by gas chromatography‐mass spectrometry on days 0, 2, 7, and 14 in AHDS‐D, and on day 0 in HC‐D. Statistical analysis was performed with Friedman test for comparison of BA over time in AHDS‐D, and unpaired t‐test or Mann‐Whitney‐test for comparison between AHDS‐D and HC‐D ( P < 0.05).
